attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, are very concerned about recent events at Westminster and the impact this  bears on the long term welfare of the United Kingdom, subject to the following red lines:

We, the undersigned have
1.	Full and unreserved confidence in Mrs Theresa May as incumbent Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
2.	NO CONFIDENCE in the British Conservative Party currently governing the said United Kingdom
3.	NO CONFIDENCE in HM’s loyal opposition lead by Jeremy Corbyn,
attributes.background: As state. Supporting comments and notes will be forward to Rt Hon John Berkov MP, Speaker of the House of commons
